channel.title: Make-Over-Mage Interface Problem
channel.description:
Well, the whole time I have had this server I have had this error with the Make-Over-Mage, I got it like this when i first got the Pwnscape3 Source + Client.
First Problem:
I can't see what I is changed my look to until i close screen, it shows how I look when I first open, but as much as i click it wont move on interface but change in-game.
Second Problem:
If I change any of colors of anything, it crashes client, so if I click a button on the right hand side of the char look, it will crash, and in the DOS box I have this error..
[code]Connecting no midi or mp3 files in folder connected to update server loading custom spirts part 1 loading custom spirts part 2 headicons_prayer 6.png Skulls Loaded Error: previn size mismatch in getnpcpos - pos:191 psize:194 Error: Packet lost type 2 refreshing connection Exception in thread "Thread-7" java.lang.NullPointerException at Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.method476(Class30_Sub2_Sub4_Sub6.java:1253) at client.method75(client.java:6434) at client.method105(client.java:9796) at client.method112(client.java:10522) at client.method146(client.java:14021) at client.method102(client.java:9253) at client.method9(client.java:10446) at Applet_Sub1.run(Applet_Sub1.java:127) at client.run(client.java:5383) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [/code]
If anyone can help me with any of these problems it will really help. Thankyou..

item.title: Make-Over-Mage Interface Problem
item.dc:creator: @TranScape TranScape
item.description:
@TranScape wrote:

^ How do you pre-load them?

Read full topic

item.title: Make-Over-Mage Interface Problem
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You can loop through them all without having to type anything, plus you could just preload them, anyway.
